==============
 Installation
==============

Installing sphinxcontrib.spelling
=================================

Install the extension with pip: ``pip install sphinxcontrib-spelling``

Configuration
=============

1. Add ``'sphinxcontrib.spelling'`` to the ``extensions`` list in ``conf.py``.

  ::

    extensions = [ 'sphinxcontrib.spelling' ]
